headline: Altria Pulls NJOY ACE As Smoke Free Investment Focus Shifts
summary: Altria Group (NYSE:MO) has removed its NJOY ACE e vapor product from retail shelves due to regulatory issues. The company does not expect to reintroduce NJOY ACE in 2026. Altria is increasing investment in its broader smoke free portfolio during this period. For you as an investor, this move sits at the intersection of regulation and product mix. Altria, long known for its Marlboro cigarettes in the US, has been building a smoke free portfolio that includes e vapor and oral nicotine...
